description:
Sun protection that you never need to reapply. Made from OR’s ActiveIce material, this sun shirt adjusts to your body’s temperature and actually makes you feel cooler while wicking away sweat.

  • ActiveIce™ is OR’s proprietary self-cooling technology reacts to increases in body temperature, dynamically cooling you when you need it most
  • Lightweight poly’ blend dries quickly, wicks away moisture, and has just enough spandex for a comfortable stretch
  • Flat seams prevent hot spots
  • Internal locker loop makes hang drying easy
  • Thumb holes prevent the sleeves from riding up when crashing into the surf
  • UPF 50+ blocks more than 98% of harsh UV
name: Outdoor Research ActiveIce Spectrum Sun Long Sleeve Tee - Men's
